Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I definitely still trust my teacher more to provide feedback just because AI is still not cleared to always be accurate, correct, and unbiased.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think teachers are more likely to provoke an emotional response (good or bad based on the feedback) and AI more likely to provoke frustration (due to inadequate feedback).

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I think the teacher knowing you personally also helps in generating feedback based on your past performance and growth.
